data: `minecraft:icon` sets the icon item component. Determines the icon to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.
`minecraft:icon` requires the Holiday Creator Features experimental toggle to be set to `true` in order to function properly.

>Holiday Creator Features contains experimental gameplay features. As with all experiments, you may see additions, removals, and changes in functionality in Minecraft versions without significant advanced warning.
>To learn more about Experimental Features, please visit [Experimental Features in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition](../../../../../Documents/ExperimentalFeaturesToggle.md)

data.Name: legacy_id
data.Description: Legacy texture id for older item icons

data.Name: texture
data.Description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file
